member.name: T:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot
member.summary: Support class for GHIElectronics FEZCerbot for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.SetProgrammingMode(Gadgeteer.Mainboard.ProgrammingInterface)
member.summary: Changes the programming interafces to the one specified

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.SetLCD(Gadgeteer.Mainboard.LCDConfiguration)
member.summary: This sets the LCD configuration. If the value GT.Mainboard.LCDConfiguration.HeadlessConfig (=null) is specified, no display support should be active. If a non-null value is specified but the property LCDControllerEnabled is false, the LCD controller should be disabled if present, though the Bitmap width/height for WPF should be modified to the Width and Height parameters.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.SetDebugLED(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns the debug LED on or off
member.param: True if the debug LED should be on

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.PostInit
member.summary: This performs post-initialization tasks for the mainboard. It is called by Gadgeteer.Program.Run and does not need to be called manually.

member.name: P:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.MainboardName
member.summary: The mainboard name, which is printed at startup in the debug window

member.name: P:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbot.MainboardVersion
member.summary: The mainboard version, which is printed at startup in the debug window
